## Summary

> A clear and concise description of the feature being requested.

## Problem or Motivation

> What problem does this feature solve? What is the current limitation or pain point?
> Example: "Currently, users have to manually perform X, which takes Y minutes and is prone to errors."

## Proposed Solution

> Describe the feature you would like to see implemented.
> Be as specific as possible about the expected behavior.

## Alternatives Considered

> Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds? Why are they insufficient?

## Acceptance Criteria

> Define what "done" looks like for this feature. What conditions must be met for this to be considered complete?
